patterns.name: cmt_whole_01_v2
patterns.title: Whole-line comment spacing: `--  text` (GNAT style)
patterns.description: Ensures whole-line comments have exactly 2 spaces after -- when they have 0-1 spaces. Preserves comments with 2+ spaces.

patterns.name: comment_eol1_v2
patterns.title: EOL comment spacing: one before --, one after
patterns.description: Ensures inline comments have at least 1 space before and after --. Only fixes missing space after --.

patterns.name: separator_lines
patterns.title: Fix separator line comments to have 2 spaces
patterns.description: Ensures separator lines like '-- ======' have 2 spaces after --

notes.whole_line_comments: Require exactly 2 spaces after -- (compiler error if less)
notes.inline_comments: Require at least 1 space after -- (compiler error if none)
notes.preservation: Patterns preserve existing valid spacing (2+ for whole line, 1+ for inline)
notes.ascii_art: ASCII art with +-- patterns are accepted by GNAT and not modified
